welcome_message_body: Welcome to Goodmayes, United Kingdom! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its rich history and diverse culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that Goodmayes has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Rochester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Rochester Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights. It has a modern and spacious design with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines and serves a large number of European destinations. It is connected to the main terminal by a transit system.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome offers a variety of services for private and commercial flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal.
